metadata.title: CVE-2023-5481 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Downloads in Google Chrome prior to118.0.5993.70 allowed a remote attacker to spoof security UI via a craftedHTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
